pages.text: The upgraded snow globe worked to further anger the horde, and they are providing more potent materials as a result, though only when attacking as a horde. Furthermore, their ability to enter the overworld freely has increased dramatically. With these new materials, you can once again upgrade the snow globe. What could go wrong?
Summons a tier 3 horde. Must be summoned in a cold or neutral temperature environment (Unless otherwise configured), a swamp biome, the nether, or the end.
